<%= 
                      person_id = Roxiware::Param::Param.application_param_val("people", "default_biography")
                      person = Roxiware::Person.find(person_id)
                      title = Roxiware::Param::Param.application_param_val("system", "title") 
                      title =  person.full_name if title.blank?
                      content_tag(:div, :id=>"site_block") do
                          content_tag(:div, title, :class=>"site_title") + 
                          content_tag(:div, Roxiware::Param::Param.application_param_val("system", "subtitle"), :class=>"site_subtitle")
                      end +
                      content_tag(:div, @post.post_title, :id=>"post_title") +
                      content_tag(:a, content_tag(:span, "", :class=>"icon-arrow-down-7"), :id=>"post_scroll")
%>
<script>
    var header_image = $(new Image);
    header_image.bind("load", function() {
        if((this.height < 200) || (this.width < 364)) {
            $(header_image).attr("src", "<%= @default_splash_image %>");
        }
        else {
            $("#header_image").css("background-image", "url('" + $(this).attr("src") + "')");
            $("#header_image").animate({opacity:1});
        }
    });
    header_image.bind("error", function() {
        if(header_image.attr("src") != "<%= @default_splash_image %>") {
            $(header_image).attr("src", "<%= @default_splash_image %>");
        }
    });
    header_image.attr("src", "<%= @post.post_image.present? ? @post.post_image : @default_splash_image %>")
    $(window).resize(function() {
        $("div#mainBody div#top_bar_section").height($(window).outerHeight());
    });
    $(window).resize();
    $(function() {
        $("#post_scroll").click(function() {
            $.scrollTo("#center_content", 250);
        });
    });
</script>
